item.title: [317]delta based- need some help adding old runescape welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

bowzer:

seriously kid, quit waisting ur time posting, you tell me to go to class9.java, when it has nothing to do with client and i have no class9.java in my source, so theres no point. its all done in client .java…

Facepalm.

  1. “class9.java, when it has nothing to do with the client”
  2. “i have no class9. java in my source”
  3. “its all done in client .java…”

Do you know what the **** you just said…?

Read full topic

Your server might have an Interface IDs list to, though.

item.title: [317]delta based- need some help adding old runescape welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

L your way off for one, the welcome screen has nothing to do with class9.java it has NOTHING to do with client for number 2…

also i have found the interface ids for the welcome screen, just need help to put it all together

15244 = main Interface ID
17511 = Question Type
15819 = Christmas Type
15812 = Security Type
15801 = Item Scam Type
15791 = Password Safety
15774 = Good/Bad Password
15767 = Drama Type

how do i plug those interface ids into this? :

public void welcomeScreen() { sendQuest("Welcome to ", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("H", 8147); sendQuest("I", 8148); sendQuest("A", 8149); sendQuest("B", 8150); sendQuest("C", 8151); sendQuest("D", 8152); sendQuest("E", 8153); sendQuest("F", 8154); sendQuest("G", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8146); showInterface(8134); showInterface(15244); flushOutStream(); }

right now thats the code, and all it is, is a ingame welcome screen kinda like a scroll that pops up, i want the real welcome screen

Read full topic

item.title: [317]delta based- need some help adding old runescape welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

ok i know exactly what i need to do. first of all i want to change this welcome screen :

public void welcomeScreen() { sendQuest("Welcome", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("H", 8147); sendQuest("I.", 8148); sendQuest("A", 8149); sendQuest("B", 8150); sendQuest("C", 8151); sendQuest("D", 8152); sendQuest("E", 8153); sendQuest("F", 8154); sendQuest("G", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8146); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

into a welcome screen that is using this interface :

showInterface(15244);

i know exactly what i need to do, i need to change these :

sendQuest[/code]  [code]clearQuestInterface();[/code]  [code]sendQuestSomething(8146);

and the interface id of these :

sendQuest("H", 8147); sendQuest("I.", 8148); sendQuest("A", 8149); sendQuest("B", 8150); sendQuest("C", 8151); sendQuest("D", 8152); sendQuest("E", 8153); sendQuest("F", 8154); sendQuest("G", 8155);
like 8147,8148,8149,8150,8151,852 ect…
i need help finding the interface ids to fit the welcome login of showInterface(15244);

Read full topic
